Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Eliminate the cultists in the Sinestral Manor.

Take down {@LinkCreature:488#4#Lokian defenders}, {@LinkCreature:488#7#Lokian devastators}, {@LinkCreature:488#12#Lokian darkweavers}, and {@LinkCreature:488#14#Lokian bloodshapers}.

Report to Segodun when mission is complete.
Good job. Please keep up the good work for the federation.
I'm disappointed that the cultists are having a field day in the Sinestral Manor. Hurry up and eliminate them all!
